<h1> wasm attestation verifier</h1>
a demo to verify intel-signed ecdsa quotes in the browser

### quickstart:

1) get https://github.com/ensdomains/offchain-resolver
2) fetch an intel-signed attestation :

```
pnpm --silent start -i 1 --provider  https://eth-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/wsu3eqFqF2TtdHN1oGH9c6APK1kyYJxP --registry 0x00000000000C2E074eC69A0dFb2997BA6C7d2e1e 'ola-keitt.maceip.eth'
```
3) the ccip-read result for ola-keitt.maceip.eth:
```

```
4) run: ```make && make serve ```
5) paste the blob in the page:
   - <img width="675" alt="Screenshot 2024-07-10 at 4 46 03 AM" src="https://github.com/maceip/validate-sgx-quote-ens/assets/804368/f0b86f3c-4876-4c0b-98ac-a5d67abc8558">

6) if it validates, it will display the EOA owner:
    - <img width="672" alt="Screenshot 2024-07-10 at 4 46 13 AM" src="https://github.com/maceip/validate-sgx-quote-ens/assets/804368/11e21f2c-4876-48ae-90a2-12ee68ff0b41">
